feed.title: Traggo Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Traggo: v0.4.5
entry.content: • Set seconds to 0 when manually changing a time span (#110 via #175)

entry.title: New release for Traggo: v0.5.0
entry.content:
• Improve mobile design #180 by @Minnowo
  • The show/hides notes button moved into the triple-dot menu
  • Add percentage to pie chart #185 by @Minnowo
  • Add work week / 5 day week calender view #182 by @Minnowo
  • Fix handling of esc in tag selector #179 by @Minnowo
  • Fix exception on the list page #183 by @Minnowo
  • Update dependencies #181

Thanks @Minnowo for the many improvements!

entry.title: New release for Traggo: v0.5.1
entry.content: Fix date not changeable in date-time selector (#191)

entry.title: New release for Traggo: v0.6.0
entry.content: Add "total" to dashboard entries (#88 via #89) by @hulmgulm Can be enabled in the dashboard entry dialog

entry.title: New release for Traggo: v0.6.1
entry.content: Fix crash with empty dashboard data and "total" enabled (#198 by @Minnowo)
